name: Scourge of The Demon Hunter Friends
name_original: Scourge of The Demon Hunter Friends
description:
You are a flying, flesh-eating demon! In an attempt to destroy you once and for all, The Demon Hunter Friends have poisoned you with a serum that fades you out of reality! But as long as you are visible, you exist.

Fly around eating members of The Demon Hunter Friends and cover yourself in their blood so you are still visible! The blood fades away over time, so make sure to keep a consistent coat! But the less visible you are, the more difficult it may be for The Demon Hunter Friends to see you!

This game was made in 48 hours for Mark Brown's GMTK Jam

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow keys for everything

TOOLS

Unity, Photoshop, Pro Tools
